title: Bug 17825 ControlExampleText beeps when SWT.MULTI is chosen
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText emits a beep sound when SWT.MULTI is chosen, which is not the expected behavior.
OB: When selecting SWT.MULTI in ControlExampleText, a bell sound is heard. Clicking on other buttons also produces the same bell sound.
EB: I expect that selecting SWT.MULTI in ControlExampleText should not result in a bell sound. The bell sound is typically associated with an error or incorrect action.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Launch ControlExampleText.
2. Choose the option for SWT.MULTI.
3. Observe the bell sound that is emitted.
